Trade/Device Name(s): Thermo Scientific CEDIA Methamphetamine OFT Assay
Thermo Scientific CEDIA Methamphetamine OFT Calibrators
Submitter Information: Thermo Fisher Scientific, Clinical Diagnostic Division
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Thermo Scientific CEDIA Methamphetamine OFT Assay and Calibrators for qualitative detection of methamphetamine in oral fluid using immunoassay technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of methamphetamine at a cutoff of 120 ng/mL in neat oral fluid, with samples collected via Oral-Eze Saliva Collection System, calibrated against d-methamphetamine and performed on MGC 240; for clinical laboratory use only.
